function.name: deviceTemperatureSetting_increase
function.description: This function is used to increase the temperature setting of a SmartThings device.

location.description: The location where the device is located.

room.description: The room where the device is located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to increase the temperature on.

compartment.description: The predefined compartment to increase the temperature on.

temperature.description: The amount by which to increase the temperature.
